column2: Hurumende Inoti Hapana Mwana weChikoro Afa neCovid-19 Kunyangwe Vakawanda Vabatwa neChirwere Ichi
column3: Mukuru anoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Dr Agnes Mahomva vanoti kunyangwe huwandu hwevana vechikoro vari kubatwa neCovid-19 huri kuramba huchikwira, hapana mwana ati afa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino. Vana vechikoro mazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe kana kuti 839 vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 mumavhikimnaviri adarika chete. Pavanhu zana nemakumi manomwe nevaviri vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nemusi weSvondo, makumi maviri nemumwe vana vechikoro. Izvi zvasiya vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru mazana maviri zvine makumi matatu nemashanu nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi manomwe nemashanu kana kuti 235 975. Nemusi weSvondi bazi rezvehutano rinoti hakuna munhu akafa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vafa nacho vachingori zviuru zvishanu nemazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevana kana kuti 5 394. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu mamiriyoni mana nezviuru mazana matatu zvine makumi mashanu nezvishanu nemazana mashanu nemakumi masere kana kuti 4 355 580 vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yeCovid-19. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba kaviri vave mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana matatu zvine makumi masere nezvipfumbamwe nemazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevanomwe kana kuti 3 389 597. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba katatu vave zviuru zana nemakumi maviri zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nevatatu kana kuti 120 673. Bazi rezvehutani rinoti rine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuti inyatsoshanda zvakanaka. Hurumende yave kukurudzirawo kuti vana vane makore gumi nemaviri kuti vabayiwe nhomba zvanzi naDr Mahomva zvinogona kubatsira kuti vana vakawanda vasabatwe neechirwere ichi.

column2: Sarudzo Dzinotarisirwa Kuitwa Muna Chikumi Kana Chikunguru
column3: Sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, vanoti sarudzo dzichaitwa pakati pa31 Chikumi na 31 Chikunguru. Asi vanoti zuva chairo pamutemo richaziviswa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. ZEC inoti vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana matatu ndivo vakanyoresa kuvhota musarudzo. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission Amai Rindai Chipfunde Vava vanoti zviri kutaurwa naAmai Chigumba ndizvo zviri mumbiro remutemo wenyika. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, sangano reHeal Zimbabwe Trust, iro rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu nekusimudzira runyararo, rinoti pamazuva ari pakati pa10 Gumiguri 2017 na8 Kukadzi 2018, sangano ravo rakawana kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kunoita zviuru zvishanu nemazana manomwe nemanomwe munguva yekunyoresa kwevanhu kuti vagovhota musarudzo dzegore rino. Vanoona nezvemabasa musangano reHeal Zimbabwe Trust, Muzvare Sithabile Dewa, vanoti zvinhu zvakawanda zvine chekuita nesarudzo hazvina kunyatsomira zvakanaka uye Zimbabwe Electoral Commission inofanira kuzvigadzirisa sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. No media source currently available

column2: Vanhu Gumi neVashanu Vofa neKudya Hohwa hweMusango Hune Muchetura
column3: Vanhu vana kubva kumhuri imwe chete vakafa mushure mekudya hohwa une muchetura kumusha weThandanani kuFilabusi Matabeleland South. Vamwe vanhu vana vanonzi vari kurwara zvakaipisisa vari muchipatara. Izvi zvave kureva kuti vanhu vanosvika gumi nevashanu vafa nekudya hohwa usingafanire kudyiwa nevanhu uhu. Bazi rinoona nezvehutano rinoti vanhu havafanire kungodya chero hohwa hwemusango sezvo humwe huchiuraya. Vamwe vanhu gumi nemumwe vakafawo kuMberengwa, Midlands svondo rapera mushure mekudyawo hohwa hune muchetura.

column2: Paramende Inozeya Bhiri reMitemo yeSarudzo
column3: Dare reNational Assembly razeya mutemo wesarudzo weElectoral Amendment Bill uye chibvumirano chemapato ezvematongerwo enyika chekuita sarudzo dzakachena dzisina mhirizhonga, cheElectoral Code of Conduct for Political Parties and Candidates and Other Stakeholders chapinzwawo mubhiri iri kuti chive mumutemo wesarudzo. Bhiri iri rakanangana nekuvanduza mitemo yesarudzo kuti nyika ikwanise kuita sarudzo dzakachena. Zvimwe zviri kudiwa nemapato anopikisa kuti mapato aya avewo nechekuita pamwe nekuongorora kudhindwa kwemagwaro ekuvhotesa kana kuti maballot papers. Mapato aya anodawo kuti mitemo yesarudzo usungire mapato kuti ape mukana wakaenzana kuvanhukadzi nevanhurume pazvinzvimbo zvese zvino kwikwidzwa musarudzo. Chibvumirano chemapato chekuita sarudzo dzakachena icho chapinzwa mumitemo yesarudzo, chinorambidza nyaya dzemhirizhonga uye chinosungira kuti vemapato, vemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira, vanokwikwidza musarudzo vapanane mukana pamwe nekuregawo vamwe vachitaura pfungwa dzavo pamwe nekupinda mumisangano pamadiro. Chibvumirano ichi chinosungurirawo kuti vanhu vapihwe mukana wekuzvishambadza uye chinoti vaye vachazenge vachibvisa kana kubvarurwa zvinyorwa zvevamwe kana kuti maposters, varangwe nemutemo. Chibvumirano ichi chinorambidzawo kutenga vavhoti kana kutyityidzira vanhu kuti vavhotere bato rinenge richida munhu. Chinorambidzawo vemapato kuti vataure zvinenge zvabuda musarudzo zvisati zvaziviswa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission. Mukuru wesangano rePlatform for Youth Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vati danho rekuisa chibvumirano chemapato mumutemo wesarudzo chakanaka chose. VaMadhuku vati sezvo wave mutemo vanenge vautyora vacharangwa. Vati kana mutemo mutsva wesarudzo ukatevedzwa, nyika inogona kuita sarudzo dzakachena. Chibvumirano ichi chinosungirawo vemapato ezvematongerwe enyika kurega vatapi venhau vachipinda mumisangano yawo yekutsvaga rutsigiro pamwe nekuvachengetedza. Mukuru weMedia Institute of Southern Africa – Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vati vanofara nenyaya yekuti vatapi venhau vachengetedzwe pavenenge vachiita basa ravo. VaMoyo vati vatapi venhau vanogara vachishungurudzwa nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika zvikuru munguva yesarudzo uye mutemo unofanira kubuda nezvirango zvakaomarara kune vanoshungurudza vatapi venhau. Dare richiri kuzeya bhiri iri uye rinotarisirwa kuripasisa chero nguva. No media source currently available

column2: Varwere Voshaya Vanovabatsira Muzvipatara Zvikuru zveHurumende
column3: Zvinhu zvave kuramba zvichiita manyama amire nerongo muzvipatara zvikuru muguta reBulawayo mushure mekunge vana mukoti nevamwe vashandi vemuzvipatara vatangawo kuramwa mabasa senzira yekupa rutsigiro kuna vanachiremba vave nemasvondo maviri vachiramwa mabasa. Studio 7 payasvika pachipatara cheMpilo Central Hospital yawana panzvimbo dzinorapirwa vanhu vanobva kumba kana kuti Outpatient Department pamwe neCasualty Department paine vanhu vashoma zvikuru. Vanhu vazoudzwa kunzi vadzokere kudzimba dzavo mushure mekunge vana mukoti nevamwe vashandi vehurumende vaita musangano apo vatora chisungo chekutanga kuramwawo mabasa senzira yekutsigira vana chiremba avo vakatanga kuramwa mabasa masvondo maviri apfuura. Mumwe murume asina kuda kudomwa nezita ati kubva nemusi weMuvhuro ange achiuya nababa vake kuti vazoongororwa navana chiremba paMpilo asi vasingawane rubatsiro. Murume uyu ati hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavana chiremba nevamwe vashandi vemuzvipatara. Muzvare Dorcas Mpofu avo vange vaperekedza sekuru vavo kuti vazorapwawo paMpilo vati havachaziva zvekuita vakatsinhirawo kuti dai hurumende yaona zvaingaita. Mukuru waana chiremba paMpilo Hospital, Dr Solwayo Ngwenya, vati chimwe chikamu chishoma chavanachiremba chakauya kubasa asi vabvuma kuti vana chiremba pamwe nevamwe vashandi vemuzvipatara havazi kufara uye vakawanda vavo havana kuuya kubasa nemusi weChitatu zvekuti zvinhu zvikaramba zvakadaro, hupenyu hweveruzhinji hunenge hwave munjodzi. Pamashoko ari kubuda mumapepanhau ehurumende ekuti hurumende iri kuunza vana chiremba vemuchiuto muzvipatara, Dr Ngwenya vati havasati vanzwa nezvavo. Sangano reZimbabwe Nurses Association rakaita musangano nezuro muHarare pamwe nemasangano anomirira vashandi vemuzvipatara, vakatora danho rekutangawo kuramwa mabasa kutanga nhasi. Mamiriro ezvhinhu paUnited Bulawayo Hospitals ange ari mamwe chete vana chiremba vakawanda vasiri pabasa uye vanoziva zviri kuitika vaudza Studio 7 kuti vana mukoti vakawanda vange vasiri pabasa. Mumwe murume wechikuru, VaMabuku Ndlovu, avo vange vauya kuti vazoonekwa nachiremba paUBH vati vaudzwa kuti havakwanise kuonekwa nekuti vana chiremba vange vasiri pabasa. Mukuru wavana chiremba pachipatara ichi, Dr Narcisius Dzvanga, vati havakwanise kutaura nesu sezvo vange vari mumusangano. Vana chiremba vakawedzera kuramwa kwavo mabasa zvichitevera kupambwa kwakaita Dr Peter Magombeyi avo vange vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association. No media source currently available

column2: Mamonya onokwikwidza kuSA
column3: SANGANO reZimbabwe Powerlifting Federation (ZPF) riri mushishi yekuumba chikwata chenyanzvi 10 dzinosimudza masimbi ekuvaka muviri avo vachaenda kunomirira Zimbabwe kumakwikwi achaitwa kunyika yeSouth Africa munguva inotevera.   Muna Chikumi, nyanzvi dzekusimudza masimbi dzepasi rose dzichange dzichirakidzana masimba mumakwikwi eWorld Classic Open Powerlifting Championships ayo achaitirwa kuSun City, kuSouth Africa.   Sachigaro weZPF mupurovhinzi yeHarare, Moses Nyamhotsi, anoti vakatotanga kuita gadziriro dzekuenda kumutambo uyu.   Mumasvondo anotevera, anodaro Nyamhotsi, vachaita mitambo yakawanda yekusarudza chikwata chavo chevatambi 10 – varume vashanu nemadzimai mashanu.   “MunaChikumi, tinoda kutumira chikwata chedu kumutambo weWorld Classic Open Powerlifting Championship kuSouth Africa. Mutambo uyu mukuru uye vatambi vose vanoda chaizvo kuenda kunokwikwidza.   “Isu chinangwa chedu kutumira vatambi vedu 10 vanoti varume vashanu nemadzimai mashanu. Saka mumasvondo anotevera tichange tichiita mitambo yakasiyana tichisarudza vatambi vedu vatinoda kuti vapinde muchikwata chatichazotumira kuenda kuSun City kunomirira nyika kumutambo uyu.   “Tarisiro yedu ndeyekuti chikwata chedu tinge tapedza kuchisarudza munaKurume,” anodaro Nyamhotsi.   Aka kachange kari kekutanga Zimbabwe ichitumira vatambi kumutambo uyu.   Nyamhotsi anoti vanotarisira kuti chikwata chavo chiende kunobata basa sebasa kumakwikwi aya.   “Kuenda kwatichaita kuSouth Africa, tinoda kuti chikwata chedu chigonobata basa sebasa kwete kuenda kunozadzikisa chete.   Tiri kuda kutonohwina, kunyangwe tichiziva hedu kuti mutoro wacho unenge wakakura sezvo chikwata chedu chichasangana nedzimwe shasha dzepasi rose,” anodaro Nyamhotsi.

column2: WC yakandivhura mhanza: Perpetual
column3: KAPUTENI wechikwata chenyika chenetball chemaGems, Perpetual Siyachitema, anoti zvekutamba mutambo uyu zviri muropa uye kuenda kwavakaita kunokwikwidza kuWorld Cup yakaitirwa kuLiverpool, kuEngland nguva yadarika kwakavavhurira mikana yakasiyana.   MaGems akanyora nhorowondo kuve chikwata chekutanga kubva muZimbabwe kuenda kunokwikwidza kuWorld Cup uko chikwata ichi chakanotamba zvinodakadza.   “Hakuna zvimwe zvikwata zvevarume zvemuno zvakamboenda kuWorld Cup sesu asi ndinoti kuburikidza nekuenda kwatakaita kumakwishu aya kwakativhurira mukana uye netball yave kutsigirwa.   “Kubva ndakatanga kutambira maGems mugore ra2009, ndaingoshuvira kutambira netball kumakwishu makuru uye ndakazokwanisa kuzviita. Kumutambo uku ndaiziva kuti kwaizouya shasha kubva kuzvikwata zvakasiyana, kunyanya zvekuAustralia kuzonditarisa ndichitamba,” anodaro Siyachitema.   Siyachitema akazvarwa mugore ra1983 kuChitungwiza uko kwaakakurira.    Akadzidza kuzvikoro zvinoti Tasimukira Primary School, Seke 5 High neSeke 3 High.   Anoti achiri kuchikoro, ndipo paakatanga kutamba netball achitevera matsimba amai vake nemukoma wake avo vakambotambawo mutambo uyu.   Shasha iyi yakazvarirwa mumhuri yevatambi vemitambo yakasiyana sezvo baba vake – Fanuel Siyachitema – vaimbove mutambi wenhabvu ane mukurumbira kunyika yeZambia.    Amai vake nemukoma wake vese vaitamba netball muNetball Super League.   “Ndakazvarirwa mumhuri yevatambi vemitambo yakasiyana, baba vangu vaive mutambi wenhabvu ane mukurumbira kuZambia kozoti amai uye mukoma wangu vese vakatamba netball muSuper League.   “Vabereki vangu vaitoti ramba uchiita zvemitambo nekuti zvichazokupa pundutso uye ndiri kutozviona zvichitoitika iye zvino,” anodaro.   Anoti mwanasikana wake – Gugulethu – uyo ane makore 16 ekuberekwa, ari kutambawo netball pamwechete nebasketball.   “Mwanasikana wangu anotambawo netball nebasketball saka ndinofara chaizvo kuti tine zvatinofarira pamwechete.   “Iniwo ndichikura ndaimbotamba basketball panguva yandaitamba netball asi ndakazosiya basketball nekuti netball ine zvakawanda zvakayakanakira sezvo une mukana wekuzopinda basa.   “Tiri kumba, ndinoshanda nemwana wangu ndichimubatsira zvakasiyana zvemutambo uyu, ndinoda chaizvo kuti azosvike kure mumutambo uyu,” anodaro.   Shasha iyi yakwanisa kutambira zvikwata zvinosanganisira Matiza Queens, Honde Queens, Telecel Queens, ZRP PPU, Gathsmine, Trojan Mine Bindura, Railstars Bulawayo, ZPC Hanngwe uye parizvino ari kutambira pamwe nekurairidza Glow Petroleum Queens.   Siyachitema anoti murume wake ndiye chiremba wake uye anomutsigira zvikuru mumutambo uyu.   “Murume wangu haadi neni, ndiye chiremba wangu anombondibatsira kana ndakuvara. Anonditsigira zvikuru kunyangwe hazvo ndichipedza nguva ndefu ndisipo ndichifamba nemutambo uyu,” anodaro Siyachitema.

column2: Sangano ravanaChiremba reZADHR Roshora Mabatirwo eNhengo dzeZanu PF Dziri muHusungwa
column3: Sangano ravana chiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nemabatirwo ari kuitwa vamwe vevaimbove vakuru-vakuru mubato re Zanu-PF, avo vakasungwa svondo rapera. Munyori mukuru we sangano iri, Dr. Evans Masitara, vanoti sangano ravo rinoshora zvakasimba zvakaitwa nemauto nemapurisa kuvasungwa ava uye vari kuedza zvikuru kuti vapiwe mvumo yekuzvionera voga vasungwa ivavo sezvo vainzi havana kubatwa zvakanaka pavakanga vari muhusungwa, umo vanonzi vakashungurudzwa nokurohwa. Dr Masitara vanoti zviri kuitwa nemapurisa kuvasungwa hazvibumidzwe nebumbiro yemitemo. VaChombo, avo vari kupomerwa mhosva dzehuwori, vakasungwa pamwe nemunyori muboka revechidiki muZanu PF, VaKudzanai Chipanga, pamwe nemurongi wemisangano muboka revechidiki, VaInnocent Hamandishe. VaChombo naVachipanga vari kumirirwa negweta rine mukurumbira, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, uye vari kutarisirwa kudzoka mudare nemusi weMuvhuro 27 Mbudzi. No media source currently available

column2: Kusaenda kuMabasa kwaVanachiremba Kwoomesera Varwere Zvakanyanya
column3: Hupenyu hwevarwere hworamba huri munjodzi sezvo vana chiremba vari kuramba vakashinga nerekuti havazi kuzodzokera kumabasa kusvika hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo.\n\nPasvika Studio 7 pachipatara chikuru chemuBulawayo cheMpilo Central nhasi mangwanani vanhu vashoma vange vari kuzvikamu zvinorapwa varwere vanenge vachibva kumba, kwange kuchibatsirwa navana mukoti vachiri kudzidzira basa. Mumawadhi mange muine varwere vashoma vange vachionekwawo navana mukoti. Mumwe murwere anorarama nehurema, VaMalcolm Ndlovu, vati vave nevhiki vachirwara nemudumbu uye vange vauya kuti vazoonekwa navana chiremba asi vanzi vadzokere kumba sezvo vanachiremba vange vasiri pabasa. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumukuru wavana chiremba paMpilo Central, Doctor Solwayo Ngwenya, sezvo vange vachinzi vari mumusangano. Asi Doctor Mthabisi Bhebhe, vanove munyori weMpilo Doctors Association, vati vanachiremba vepachipatara ichi pamwe nevekuUnited Bulawayo Hospitals uye munyika mose, havazi kuzodzokera kubasa kusvikira hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Doctor Bhebhe, avo vakambovewo mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vemuzvipatara zvehurumende reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, vatiwo pari zvino hurumende haisati yaita zvinobatika pakugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Pakuti zvinhu zvakamira sei muzvipatara kana kwakatariswa varwere, Doctor Bhebhe vati havakwanise kuziva sezvo vasiri kuenda kubasa, asi vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende igadzirise zvichemo zvavo nekukasika kuti vakwanise kudzokera kubasa vabatsire varwere. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Kuramwa mabasa kwavana chiremba kwasvika muzuva rechimakumi maviri nemanomwe. Mune imwewo nyaya, kanzuru yeguta reBulawayo inoti iri kushushikana nekuti vagari vari kuramba vachishandisa mvura yakawanda izvo zvinogona kuzosiya madhamu anopa mvura muguta iri asisina mvura. Vachitaura neStudio 7 mushure memusangano nevagari pamusoro pemamiriro akaita zvinhu muguta panyaya dzemvura, munyori wekanzuru, VaChristopher Dube, vakurudzira kuti vagari vashandise mvura zvine mwero. Guta reBulawayo rinowana mvura kubva kumadhamu matanhatu anosanganisira Inyankuni, Lower Ncema, Upper Ncema, pamwe neUmzingwane, uye kwasara zvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana zvemvura mumadhamu ari kushanda pari zvino. Dhamhu reUpper Ncema rakatomiswa kushandiswa pari zvino nekuda kwekushomeka kwemvura uye kanzuru inoti Umzingwane rinogona kumiswawo munguva pfupi inotevera. Panyaya yekuwedzerwa kwemari inoshandiswa nekanzuru kana kuti supplementary budget yakaparurwa nekanzuru svondo rapera, VaDube vatsanangura kuti bhajeti iyi ichashanda chete kana yapasiswa nehurumende. Pabhajeti iyi kanzuru inoti inoda kukwidza mitero nezvikamu zvinosvika mazana matatu kubva muzana uye vamwe vagari vari kutsutsumwa kuti mari iyi yakawandisa. No media source currently available

column2: Vanhu Vomanikidzwa Kutenga Hupfu neZvitupa
column3: Vamwe vagari vemuChinhoyi vanoti havasi kufara nedanho rakatorwa nevamwe vanotengesa hupfu rekuti munhu aburitse chitupa chake kuti atenge hupfu. Zvitoro zvakaita seN. Richards, Gain Wholesale neOK Zimbabwe zvave kutengesera hupfu kune munhu anenge ayine chitupa chete. Danho iri riri kushorwa nevakawanda avo vari kuti zvinosiya vanhu vakawanda vasina zvitupa vachifa nenzara. Mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi VaBasildon Kanonge vanoti zvekudya ikodzero yemunhu nekudaro haafanirwe kutadza kudya nekuti haana chitupa. Izvi zvatsigirwa naVaIsrael Nyandoro avo vanoti vanhu vakawanda havasikupihwa zvitupa kwamudzviti zvichinzi havana mapepa anogadzira zvitupa. Asi vamwe vakaita saAmai Cornilia Matekenya vanoti kutenga hupfu munhu aburitsa chitupa zviri kuita kuti hupfu hutengwe nevanhu vakawanda uye zvinoderedza huori. VaDesire Mapfumo vanoti zvose zviri kuitika zvinoreva kuti chikafu chishoma munyika nekudaro hurumende inofanirwa kuunza hupfu hwakawanda kuvanhu. Mukuru wechitoro cheN. Richards VaJohn Matikiti vanoti vari kuti munhu anoda hupfu anofanirwa kuuya nechitupa kuti vazvichenure kana vazobvunzwa kuti vakatengesera ani hupfu. Hupfu hweRoller Meal uhwo hwavekutengwa nemadhora makumi manomwe emabhondi kana RTGS sezvo vanohugaya vachipihwa mari nehurumende huri kunetsa munyika yose. Hurumende iri kufungawo kupa vanhu vanoshaiwa makuponi ekutenga hupfu senzira yekupedza huori munyaya dzezve kugaya nekutengeswa kwehupfu. Vamwe vanhu vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutanga hupfu muzvitoro nemari iri pasi vonoutengesa nemutengo wepamusoro pamukoto. World Food Programme inoti vanhu vanoda kusvika mamiriyoni masere vakatarisana nenzara inotyisa munyika uye vanoda kupihwa chikafu nechimbi chimbi. Izvi zvinonzi nesangano iri zvakakonzerwa nekusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura uye mitemo yehurumende iri kungovandudzwa chero nguva. No media source currently available

column2: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kushanda neMasangano eVashandi muKushambadza Nhomba yeCovid-19
column3: Hurumende iri kukurudzirwa kuti ishande nemasangano anomirira vashandi mukushambadza kwairi kuita nhomba inodzivirira Covid-19, kuitira kuti chirongwa chekubaya nhomba ichi chibudirire. Kurudziro iyi inobva kumukuru wesangano reCommunity Workin Gropu on Health, VaIta Rusike, uye inouya panguva iyo vanhu vari kuzvipira kubaiwa nhombaye Sinopharm iripo iye zvino vari kuramba vari vashoma. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa kuti vanhu zana negumi nevasere kana kuti 118, ndivo chete vakabaiwa nhomba munyika yose nemusi weChina, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba iyi munyika yose pazviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu zvine gumi nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 36 019. VaRusike vanoti kana pakasatorwa matanho akasimba nekukasika pakushambadzwa kwenhomba iyi, chirongwa chePhase 2 chichangotanga ichi chinogona kungofanana nechePhase 1, icho chisina kuwana vanhu vakawanda. Asi mukuru ari kutungamira hurongwa hwekurwisana neCovid-19, Dr. Agnes Mahomva, vanoti kubva pakutanga, hurumende yanga ichingoshanda nemapoka ose muhurongwa uhwu saka nekudaro hapana vari kusiiwa kunze. Dr. mahomva vari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vatambire chirongwa ichi sechavo, vachitri hurumende iri kuita payo saka zvasarira veruzhinji kuti vapindewo mazviri. Zvichakadaro, hurumende yakazivisawo nemusi weChina kuti vanhu vatatu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19, vamwe makumi matatu nevatanhatu vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Izvi zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga hwasvika pazviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu zvine mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nevanomwe, kana kuti 36 377. Huwandu hwevanhu vafa hwakasvikawo pachiuru nemazana mana ane makumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri, kana kuti 1 492. Vanhu vapona kubva kuchirwere ichi vakasvika pazviuru makumi matatu nezvitatu zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi manomwe nevaviri, kana kuti 33 972. No media source currently available No media source currently available

column2: Juventus yodzora Morata
column3: kuedza kudzora mutambi weChelsea – Alvaro Morata – zvichitevera kutatarika kwaaita mumwaka wake wekutanga kuStamford Bridge.   Chikwata ichi chiri kuda mutambi uyu nechikwereti mwaka unotevera nekudaro chiri kugadzirira kubhadhara mari inosvika 13 miriyoni paunzi uye chine chivimbo chekuzomutenga zvachose.   Mari inozodirwa mutambi uyu inozosvika ku43 miriyoni paunzi kana chikwata chekuTurin ichi chikada kuzomutenga zvachose mugore ra2019.   Alvaro anoda chaizvo kudzokera kuJuventus uko kwaakatambira kwemakore maviri asati aenda kuReal Madrid iyo yakambomudzora mugore ra2016.   Sekutara kweTuttosoprt, maBlues ari kunzi anoda kutenga Edinson Cavani kubva kuParis Saint-Germain sezvo chikwata chekuFrance ichi chichida kugadzirisa mapepa acho maringe nemashandisirwo emari apo chiri kurwisa nyaya dzeFinancial Fair Play.   Izvi ndizvo zvichavhurira Morata mukana wekudzokera kuJuventus, kozoti PSG neBayern zviri kudawo chizvarwa chekuSpain ichi.   Morata akatamba zvinonwisa mvura kuStamford Bridge izvo zvakamuona achinwisa katanhatu mumitambo minomwe.   Kubva ipapo, mutambi uyu akabva atanga kutatarika zvikuru sezvo akazonwisa kashanu chete kubva mumitambo 22 kuchikwata chaAntonio Conte. – SportsMail Football

column2: Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa Vochema Zvichitevera Kuputsirwa paVanotengesera
column3: Sangano rinomirira vanotengesera mumigwagwa reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, (VISET) rinoti riri kushoropodza zvikuru danho rekanzuru yeguta reHarare rekuparadza kwayakaita misika yevanhu pamwe nekuparadza zvinhu zvavo panzvimbo yemabhizimusi yeBudiriro 5 svondo rino. Mugwaro raraburitsa, sangano iri rinoti rakawana humbowo hwekuti kuparadzwa kwenzvimbo dzekutengesera uku kwakapiwa mvumo nekanzuru pamwe neboka reEnvironmental Management Agency, EMA, uye VISET inotiwo ine humbowo hwekuti zvakaitwa izvi zviri kunze kwemutemo. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reEMA panyaya iyi. Izvi zvinoitika mushure mekunge kanzuru yatora danho rimwechetero svondo rapera payakaputsa zvivakwa zvevanhu vaitengesera paKamunhu Business Centre kuTafara/Mabvuku, uye kuedzawo kuputsa nzvimbo inoitirwa mitambo yeMoto Republik iri mukati meHarare. Asi mutauriri wekanzuru VaMichael Chideme vanoramba mashoko ekuti kanzuru yavo iri kuputsa zvinhu zvavanhu, vachiti chiri kuitwa nekanzuru yavo kuchenesa guta. VaChideme vanotiwo kanzuru yavo ine hurongwa hwekusangana nevaridzi veMoto Republik kuti vaone kuti vangaenda mberi sei. Izvi zvinotevera kupera kwemazuva manomwe akanga apiwa nekanzuru ekuti varidzi veMoto Republik vaparadze voga zvivakwa zvavo. VaChideme vanoti kambani iyi yakanga yaisa zvivakwa zvayo zvema container izvo zvisingabvumidzwi nemutemo wekanzuru yavo. No media source currently available

column2: ZIMASCO Yodzinga Mhuri Mudzimba Pamusaka Perendi
column3: Mhuri mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu dziri kudzingwa mudzimba dzekambani yezvicherwa yeZIMASCO dzadziri kugara nekuda kwetadza kubhadhara mari dzerendi. Kambani yeZIMASCO yakapa vagari ava magwaro ekuvazivisa kuti vabude mudzimba idzi musi wa31 Zvita gore rapera usati wasvika kana kuti vabhadhare mari dzezvikwereti zverendi dzose. Asi vagari ava vanoti vakakundikana kubhadhara mari dziri kudiwa nekambani iyi nekuti vazhinji vavo havasevenzi, sezvo vakagumurwa pamabasa nekambani iyi kare. Vakawanda vevanhu ava vane zvikwereti zverendi zviri pakati pemadhora mazana matanhatu kusvika pachiuru chemadhora. Vagari ava vanobhadhara madhora makumi matatu nemanomwe pamwedzi. Chiri kushamisa nekurwadza vagari ava ndechekuti mapurisa ekambani yeZIMASCO haasi kuburitsa midziyo yavo panze asi kuti vari kuvharira midziyo iyi mudzimba vachiisa svumbunuro dzavo. Mumwe wevavharirwa imba ndiAmai Stella Ngandu avo vanoti vakagara paimba yavharwa iyi kwemakore makumi maviri apfuura sezvo murume wavo asina kupihwa mari dzake dzose nekambani yeZIMASCO. Amai Ngandu vanoti havarambi kuti vane chikwereti cherendi chinosvika mazana masere emadhora asi vanoti havana kwekuenda. Sachigaro wemadzimai mubato reZanu PF munzvimbo iyi, Amai Edna Chimwanza, vanoti vanzi vabudewo mumba kana vakasabhadhara mari inoita madhora mazana mana sezvo chikwereti chavo chiri chiuru chemadhora. Asi Amai Chimwanza vanoona ruoko rwezvematongerwa enyika mukudzingwa mudzimba idzi. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nasachigaro wedunhu reMutorashanga muZanu PF, VaMaricosi Mapuraganda, avo vanoti vanhu vanodzingwa gore rese rinenge riine sarudzo munyika. VaMuparaganda vanotyira kuti nhengo dzavo dzichatadza kuvhota dzadzingwa. Asi patabvunza VaMuparaganda kuti sei vachifunga izvozvo sezvo kanzura wenzvimbo iyi iri nhengo yeZanu PF, vati kanzura Amai Ellen Mwachirimba vari kushanda nekambani yeZIMASCO. Vatiwo Amai Mwachirimba vaitsigira chikwata cheLacoste icho chairwisana neG40 kuti vatore masimba apo vaimbove mukuru wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakanga vasati vabviswa pachigaro gore rapera muna Mbudzi. Asi Kanzura Amai Mwachirimba vanoti vanhu vanga vajaira kugara mahara mudzimba dzeZIMASCO vachishandisa zita reZanu PF vachiramba kubhadhara. Amai Mwachimbira vanoti munhu anofanirwa kubhadhara mari yerendi kana kunotaurirana nevaridzi vedzimba kuti anobhadhara sei. Mukuru wekambani yeZIMASCO kuMutorashanga, Amai Fadzai Gono, varamba kutaura nevatori venhau vachiti havabvumirwe nemutemo webasa. Havasi vashandi veZIMASCO chete vari kutarisana nedambudziko iri, sezvo vashandi vemumigodhi vakawanda vari kudzingwa mudzimba dzavaigara vasati varasikirwa nemabasa avo. No media source currently available

column2: Munyika Moita Kusagadzikana neNyaya yeRufu rwaVaShiri Uye Kuratidzira
column3: Munyika hamuna kugadzikana zvichitevera hurongwa hwekuratidzira kuri kuda kuita nevanopikisa nemusi weChishanu uye kushaya kwegurukota rezvekurima, VaPerence Shiri. Nemusi weChitatu, Politburo yeZanu-PF yakapomera dzimwe nhengo dzebato iri mhosva yekushanda nevanopikisa kuratidzira kuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vabviswe pachigaro. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri webato reZanu-PF, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakaudza vatori venhau neChitatu kuti nhengo yePolitburo, Amai Cleveria Chizema, vainge vamiswa kuva nhengo yebato nekuda kwekuti vainge vachishande nevamwe vavengi vebato kuda kupidigura hurumende. Vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika vanoti mubato mune mapisha pisha uye kupumhana huori. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti munyika hamuchina kugadzikana nenyaya yekunetsana mubato reZanu-PF kwopa kuti hurumende ingogara ichiti mauto agare akadzipakatira. Asi nhengo yeZanu-PF inomirira Makonde, VaKindness Paradza, vanoti vekunze ndivo vari kuita kuti munyika musaite kugadzikana. No media source currently available

column2: Zanu PF Yoramba Kubvisa Mari kuKanzuru yeMasvingo
column3: Nhengo dze Zanu PF dziri kufamba nemotakari dzakanamirwa maposita emutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmerson Mnangagwa, vanonzi vari kuramba kubhadhara mari yekupaka motokari dzavo muguta. Vashandi vekanzuru vanoita basa rekubhadharisa vatyairi vemotokari vanoti vatsigiri veZanu PF vari kuva shungurudza sezvo mutemo uchiti munhu wose anofanira kubhara mari iyo inozoshandiswa nekanzuru kugadzirisa migwagwa mudhorobha. Varidzi vemotokari vanobhadhariswa masenzi makumi mashanu pamaminetsi makumi matatu, kana dhora paawa imwe chete kuti vapake motokari dzavo. Vamwe vevashandi vataura neStudio7 asi varamba kudomwa mazita avo nekutyira hupenyu hwavo vanoti vatsigiri veZanu PF vari kufamba ne motokari dzakanzi #ED has my Vote vari kuramba kubvisa mari idzi. "Isu vashandi vekanzuru mashandiro edu ari kurwadza nekuti period yatapinda ndeye ma elections zvekuti vanhu vari kufamba vane motokari dzakanamirwa ma sticker akanzi ED has my vote emutungamiriri wenyika vakasvika pama bay varikuramba kubhadhara parking vachiti tisu vebato riri kutonga, izvi zvakunzoeresa kuti vamwe wo vanhu varambe kubhara avchiti ve party havasi kubhadhara," adaro mumwe mushandi. Vamwe vashandi vanoti vanotya kusunga motokari idzi neganjo(clamping), dzinenge dzaramba nekuti Zanu PF inozivikanwa nemhirizhonga nekudaro vanotyira hupenyu hwavo. Vagari veMasvingo vari kunyunyuta nemaitiro aya vachiti ivo vakaramba kubhadhra mota dzavo dzinosungwa neganjo votadza kufamba. Mukuru webasa kuMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance, VaAnoziva Muguti, vashoropodza zviri kuitwa neZanu PF, vachiti zvinotyora mitemo yenyika. Meya weGuta reMasvingo, VaHubert Fidze, vati nyaya iyi yava kwavari uye vachatora matanho sekanzuru. "Tiri kunzwa nyaya iyo saka tiri kuti kuvana vedu ma marshal vatipe ma reports aiwawo then ini ndichaenda nawo kukanzuru, ndozotaura neve Zanu PF ende chinondishamisa ndechekuti munhu anosvika pakushandisa zita re President ED Mnangawa achiramba kubhdhara 50 cents chaiyo," vadaro VaFidze. Mutauriri weZanu PF muMasvingo, VaRonald Ndava, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti manyepo ari kutaurwa nevashandi vekanzuru vachiti bato ravo rine vanhu vane hunhu vasingaite zvisina basa nezita remutungamiri wavo. Vashandi vekanzuru vanoti nekuwanda kwaita motokari dzebato reZanu PF, kanzuru inogona kurasikirwa nemari yakwanda kana mokokari idzi dzisingabhadhare mari sezvinoitwawo nevamwe vatyairi. No media source currently available

column2: ZIMPARKS Yogura Zvipembere Nyanga Kudzivirira Kuurayiwa Zviri Kunze kweMutemo neVanotsvaga Nyanga
column3: Zimbabwe Parks and Wildlife Management Authority, ZIMPARKS, yakaparura zvakare chirongwa chekugura zvipembere nyanga senzira yekudzivirira kuurayiwa kwazvo nevanovhima zvipembere vachida nyanga dzazvo. Mutauriri weZIMPARKS, VaTinashe Farawo, vanoti izvi zvinhu zvavagara vachiita nguva nenguva, uye gore rino vari kuronga kubvisa zvipembere chiuru nyanga, vachitanga nezviri ku Lake Chiwero. VaFarawo vanoti nyanga dziri kubviswa pazvipembere izvi dzichachengetwa kudura ravanochengetera nyanga dzezvipembere kubva mugore ra 1975. Vanonyika yasarirwa nezvipembere zvinosvika chiuru nemazana maviri chete, izvo zviri kuita kuti vakwanise kufambisa chirongwa chekugura nyanga ichi zviri nyore. Asi VaFarawo vanoti izvi hazvisi nyore kuitwa kunzou nekuti nyika ine nzou dzakawandisa zvakanyanya. No media source currently available

column2: Vamwe Vagari vekwaMutoko Vonyunyuta neKushaya Cheuviri Kubva muMatombo Anocherwa Mudunhu Mavo
column3: Vamwe vagari vekwamutoko vakapinda mumusangano wakaitwa paMutoko Centre neVOA yakabatana neMedia Centre neChitatu chapfuura vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti itore matanho ekusimudzira mararamiro avo. Vagari ava vakaisawo mibvunzo kune mumwe akapindawo mumusangano uyu, VaShame Kativhu, avo vaimbove kanzura, vachida kunzwisisa kuti makanzura anombotaurawo here pamusoro pematambudziko avanosangana nawo mudunhu ravo pavanoita misangano yavo. Vazhinji vevanhu ava vaidawo kunzwisisa mafambisirwo emari dzinobva mukucherwa kwematombo kana kuti black granite mudunhu mavo, vachiti madzishe namasabhuku vanifanirwa kuona kuti vabata nyaya idzi zvine hungwaru. Chirongwa ichi chaikokerwa nemukuru weMedia Centre VaErnest Mudzengi, uye chakanga chakatsigirwa nemuzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe. No media source currently available

column2: ‘Zvimbokoma zvaJoshua naWilder zvombomiswa’
column3: anofanirwa kumira kwegore rese asati arwa naDeontay Wilder mumutambo weWorld Heavyweight Title Unification, sekutaura kwaBarry Hearn.   Asi, Hearn – uyo ane makore akawanda ari munyaya dzekuronga mitambo anoti achange asipo pachaitwa hurukuro dzekuronga nezvemutambo uyu pachasangana shasha iyi iyo ine mabhande eWBO, IBF neWBA naJoshua svondo rinotevera apo vacharonga remangwnaa rake mumutambo uyu.   Sachigaro weMatchroom – Hearn – akagadza mwana wake, Eddie, kuti agotungamira Joshua mumutambo uyu nenyaya dzake dzese asi anenge achiraira hake pano neapo zvese zvinenge zvichidiwa kuti basa riende kumberi.   Wilder, uyo ane bhande reWBC, mwedzi wadarika akanyorera Joshua padandemutande achitaura kuti vamiriri vake vane mari inosvika 35.9 miriyoni paunzi yekuronga kuti mutambo uyu uitwe pakati pavo gore rino.   Eddie akatsanangura kuti vane zvakawanda zvavanoda kuti vatange vavimbiswa vasati vasaina kuti mutambo uyu uenderere mberi.   Asi baba vake vakataura kuti nhandare yeManchester United yeOld Trafford ndiyo inogona kurongerwa kuitwa mutambo uyu vachiti, “Zvinogoneka”.   “Ndine musangano naAnthony Joshua svondo rinotevera naEddie, Eddie asati aenda kuNew York kunoronga mutambo uyu.” – SportsMail Boxing

column2: Tarakinyu omirira Zim kuChina
column3: SHASHA yemarathon — Moses Tarakinyu — ndiye achanomirira Zimbabwe kumujaho weWorld Half Marathon kuChina munaMbudzi zvichitevera kuhwina kwaakaita mumakwikwi eTanganda Half Marathon svondo radarika kwaMutare.   Mujaho uyu ndiwo unoshandiswa kusarudza shasha yemarathon inomirira nyika kuWorld Half Marathon izvo Tarakinyu akakwanisa kuita svondo radarika apo abvuta mukombe kubva kuna Misheck Sithole uyo akapedza ari pechitatu.   Achitaura mushure mekukunda mumakwikwi aya, Tarakinyu anoti chiremerera chikuru kuhwina mujaho uyu pamwe nekuwaniswa mukana wekunomirira nyika kuChina.   “Handisi kugona nekufara nekuti sevamhanyi ndizvo zvatinotarisira pose patinenge tichikwikwidza mumijaho yakasiyana.   “Ndiri kufara zvikuru sezvo ndave nemukana wekunomirira nyika yangu kuChina kumujaho weWorld Half Marathon uko ndoziva kunenge kune shasha dzakawanda dzinobva pasi rose,” anodaro Tarakinyu.   Mutungamiri weNational Athletics Association of Zimbabwe (NAAZ), Tendai Tagara, anoti vachatsigira Tarakinyu zvakazara apo achaenda kumomirira nyika kuChina.   “Tarakinyu gore rino ange achimhanya zvinonwisa mvura nekuti ahwina mijaho yakawanda chaizvo. Saka tinoziva kuti paachaenda kuChina achanorwa semvumba uye isu tichamutsigira mugadziriro yake,” anodaro Tagara.   Zvakadaro, kune mimwe mijaho, Olivia Chitate akakwanisa kuchengetedza mukombe waakatora mugore ra2019 apo akahwina mujaho wemadzimai we21km Kuchiti mumujaho we10km wevarume, wakahwinwa naWellington Varevi apo wemadzimai ukahwinwa naAnne Chirisa.   Shasha yemujaho wewiricheya, Elford Moyo, akarakidza kuti haasi kuzosiya humambo hwake mumujaho uyu zvichitevera kuhwina kwaakaita zvakare.   Nerimwewo divi, kumadzimai ari kusimukira, Stella Jongwe, akahwina mujaho weTanganda Half Marathon kekutanga.
